website_summaries.verdict: This durable pair is recognized for their sleek design and supreme functionality, especially when it comes to keeping wine cool.
pros: Double-walled, stainless steel construction keeps wine at room temperature no matter the weather
Includes a BPA-free lid with a rubber stopper for leak-free use
cons: A few customers had the product arrived with a bent stem

customer_reviews.title: Suits my needs
customer_reviews.text: I got this set of 2 so I could have 1 for home & 1 for our camper. The price is certainly reasonable. I enjoy the occasional glass of wine outdoors, but unfortunately so do the bees & other insects. I prefer not to share with them. This discourages them just fine. I even leave the lid slightly open sometimes, so the wine can breathe a bit. One of the glasses is slightly wobbly, but not to the point where I wouldn't use it. I may even get another set so I have an extra for guests. All in all a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mama B

customer_reviews.title: Almost Like a Yeti but Way Less Expensive
customer_reviews.text: I saw these at a local Christmas market being sold for $22 each! Thought that was a little high for a knock off Yeti but LOVED the idea of the wine cup with the stem! So happy to find these on Amazon for such a cheap price! I'm going to use them as stocking stuffers this year!
customer_reviews.author: Shoppin' Happy

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, but broken upon arrival.
customer_reviews.text: I had to send them back because the stem was broken off of the bottom of one of them. Incredibly disappointed. They were a great size but I will stick with the stemless one I already have. I can’t believe the stem cannot be soldered or attached successfully through some other means. I read a number if other reviews about the broken stem. Poor workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Happygirl

customer_reviews.title: Really keeps the wine cold!
customer_reviews.text: The goblets do a great job of keeping my white wine cold, especially if they are pre-chilled. I love the fact that they are dishwasher safe as well. I started looking at stainless steel for wine, as we kept breaking the glass ones on our new granite countertop, and I don't like drinking wine from plastic. I just wish they came in a smaller size, however, as I don't drink that much at once.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice Quality stainless steel glasses I purchased them for a christmas gift now considering buying a set for myself😍 I purchased another brand last year and they do keep liquids cold as long as the drink etc last. I have not tired any hot liquids but sure they will hold the heat. I’m pretty sure these will be just as good if not better as the ones from last year and they seem to be alittle better in Quality than the other company Only con they do not sit well in your car cup holder as soon as you turn a corner or any movement there it goes
customer_reviews.author: CLP

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks very cold
customer_reviews.text: These SS wine glasses are awesome! 12oz. capacity, more than plenty for any wine or cocktail, even beer. Lid fits tight enough to avoid leaks. My drink was kept cold in direct sunlight on 95° day, for more than 1 hour. I’m sure it stays cold for much longer. Use them at home all the time now. Will definitely bring on my next vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Fine Wine Goblets
customer_reviews.text: The stainless steel goblets were a gift and the recipient was surprised and happy with the gift. They are well made and have lids to protect the wine inside. They are ideal to be used outside to keep insects out of your wine and will not break if dropped. Wine On
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a gift, they were beautifully packaged and are exactly what I was looking for. They would make a great gift for your wine loving friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: P White

customer_reviews.title: Everyone love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I got these glasses for my girls group club. I had them monogram. We love them so much. I post them on fb. I got so many likes and where you got them. ♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️
customer_reviews.author: Maria b

customer_reviews.title: classy wine goblets
customer_reviews.text: These work great on the boat, they look good and held up to some continuous usage. plus they look real classy when your entertaining friends onboard. they have a nice sturdy feel, no change in flavor. chill them beforehand and keeps your chardonnay chilly on a hot summer day.
customer_reviews.author: L. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: These can be pre-chilled in the refrigerator...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these wine glasses for use on our patio. They are insulated and keep your beverage cold. They also come with a travel top with slide open drinking slot [similar to a travel coffee cup]. Thus they would be great for the RV or Campsite.
customer_reviews.author: research4u

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy well made wine goblet
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as a solution of keeping white wine cold Our them in freezer for several hours. But wine cooled quickly Double wall did nothing to keep cold Well made wine glass. Good value. Suitable for red wines and white
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Check BOTH immediately for stability when full
customer_reviews.text: One is great, the other has a misshapen base and is totally unstable when there's liquid inside. I didn't realize there was an issue with the second one until I'd thrown away the packaging and it was beyond the return period.
customer_reviews.author: Vickki

customer_reviews.title: Better the second time around
customer_reviews.text: Had to exchange the first delivery due to the defective appearance of the product and original packaging undone. The exchange was easily done and the newly arrived product Packaging was in tack The product itself was in good condition
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and versatility
customer_reviews.text: Just got these and tried them out last night at an outdoor concert. Great size, the lid doesn't leak, and they look sleek and elegant. Very pleased with the quality and price point. Can't wait to get some for friends who live at the beach - perfect Christmas gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great for Outdoors
customer_reviews.text: These are great insulated wine glasses, and I loved having them come as a set! I've got plenty of wine glasses, but I enjoy these for when I am relaxing somewhere outside. They don't break, and the lid keeps the bugs out (that's important for us Floridians) and the wine inside (important for tailgating/partying).
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: BEST WINE GLASSES EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my Niece because I LOVE mine so much! We live in Texas so these are beyond fabulous to take out on the porch and keeping your wine cool on those warm Texas evenings and with the lid the wine stays BUG FREE! Whoo Hoo! And don't have to worry about them getting knocked over because there is no glass to break! LOVE THEM!!
customer_reviews.author: 3tabs

customer_reviews.title: Mother-in-law  loves these glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a Xmas present and she uses them nearly everyday. The stems make it easy to carry around and better than those thick "tumblers". Also very light, and don't tire out her hands. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Alien643

customer_reviews.title: exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wine glasses would recommend, sadly I will be returning them as they were a housewarming gift and 2 others also bought them. But do not hesitate to buy if you want great looking wine glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Dizzy Lt

customer_reviews.title: great glasses!
customer_reviews.text: great size. love the non-skid on the bottom. and they DO keep your wine chilled! haven't used the lids, but they look to be excellent quality also. you won't be disappointed with these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Storye

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for by the pool!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! Drinks by the pool are much easier now! In or out of the water. I bought several boxes and gift them one glass at a time. My friends have all loved them! Best price around!
customer_reviews.author: GJCST

customer_reviews.title: Like a Yeti for a Wineo
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife. She loves drinking wine when in the bathtub. Now she doesnt have to worry broken glass in the tub...plus if you like your wine chilled, it keeps it nice and chilled!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent to throw in freezer before serving white wine
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek looking. Not sure yet if we can engrave them, but will give them a try. Excellent to throw in freezer before serving white wine. Keeps in cool and the lid is great! Perfect for boating, around the pool, the campfire, golfing or tailgating. Nice non-skid bottom is a great touch. Love them and am giving them as gifts because I am so happy with my set that I just used at a tailgate. THE PRICE IS PERFECT. Quality product for set of two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A gag gift turned real gift.
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this as a gag gift for someone that gets a little... messy... when imbibing. You know what? It's actually pretty brilliant, for all the adult sippy cup jokes it works quite well & can (kind of) pass the glance test at medievalist events.
customer_reviews.author: G K H

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: I love how cold these keep your white wines. I keep mine in the freezer until I am ready to use them. I live on a sailboat so them being shatterproof and leak proof is a plus! You can't beat the price either. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SV Ventolines

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Living in the FL Keys I have many different Rtic, Yeti, etc type tumblers and use them daily, This product is awesome!! I use them on my charter boat to serve guests wine, mimosas, etc., without having to worry about broken glass or even worse...warm drinks. Lids work great to keep the drinks contained while underway. Excellent product and great service (Thanks Steve) you won't be disappointed, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and high qualilty
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our sailboat. Adult sippy cups! Love the quality, the look, everything about them. They are great when we're out at sea. No spills.
customer_reviews.author: Picky bee-eye

customer_reviews.title: No more warm drinks during the summer!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these glasses! I live in Arizona, so my ice is always melting in 60 sec. when I'm outside. This insulated glass kept my drink ice cold, and I love the lid, helps with keeping my drink inside the cup while floating around in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Smith

customer_reviews.title: Arrived bent but they are beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two sets but one arrived with a bent stem and others did not sit flat on the table. Had to return for new ones which were okay for what we needed. We had some engraved for a gift. Don't regret the purchase. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Florida gal

customer_reviews.title: Nice outdoor wine glass
customer_reviews.text: Great price- great product. Very sturdy. Very nice for drinking wine outside and keeping the bugs away! Also- so nice to have on a hot day without the sweat running down the glass. Arrived very quickly- packaged nicely - solid product.

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty. Keeps bugs out while camping. Unfortunately it is not leak proof. Glass fell on its side and spilled wine all over.

customer_reviews.title: They're not actually leak proof, they leak alot.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as a gift for my girlfriend and I'm generally satisfied with them but I'm really disappointed that the lids aren't leak proof. It's advertised as being leak proof but they leak, alot if knocked over. And that was pretty much the point of me buying them, I wanted somethingthat didn't leak. Now I'llhave to find a better lid or a better set altogether.

product_meta.title: FineDine Premium Grade 18/8 Stainless Steel Wine Glasses 12 Oz. Double-Walled Insulated Unbreakable Goblets (Set of 2) Stemmed Wine Glass BPA-Free Leak Resistant Lid for Red White Wine, Brushed Metal
feature_bullets: FineDine set of 2 modern elegant stainless steel wine glasses with spill-resistant lid adds a contemporary twist to your wine glass collection. These tumbler wine glass are double wall insulated, feature a BPA-free clear lid and non-slip base that’s perfect for travel, the outdoors, boating, and more!

These stainless steel wine glass set's double-walled construction keeps wine at room temperature regardless of how hot or cold it is outside. Made of 18/8 gauge steel, these stainless wine glasses are shatter and rustproof for a metal wine glass that’ll stay pristine for years to come and make an excellent Christmas, holiday, birthday and special occasion gift.

A detachable, BPA-free lid with rubber gasket provides a strong, leak-resistant seal that stays on even when the cup accidentally takes a tumble. The clear lid allows for visibility of the steel wine set’s contents and has an easy-slide window for drinking while also keeping bugs and debris out of drinks. A thumb-push lip makes lid removal easy.

The bottom of the large red wine glasses feature a non-skid rubber base that grips all surfaces. The foot of the wine cup is flat and stabilized to keep the metal cup flush on tables and countertops. These glasses are perfect for entertaining friends both indoors and outdoors.

A stout bulb shape feels natural and comfortable when cradled in the hand while also allowing wines to breathe, enhancing flavors and releasing its decadent aromas. The pinot noir wine glasses thin rim allows wine to flow cleanly and smartly when drinking. Diameter: 8 ⅛” height, 3 ¼”;12 ounces..

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars911 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
